Class CookieManagement

extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used to create new User cookie identifiers.

    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • createNewCookie

        public static javax.servlet.http.Cookie createNewCookie(UserRepository userRepository)
        Checks for existing cookies and generates a new one.
        Parameters:
        userRepository - instance of UserRepository.
        Returns:
        Cookie object containing the new cookie.

      • createCookie

        public static javax.servlet.http.Cookie createCookie(java.lang.String name,
                                                     java.lang.String value)
        Create a cookie given name and value. This function is mainly used in the login process. Once the credentials match, this function is called to create the cookie for the authenticated User.
        Parameters:
        name - String, name of the cookie.
        value - String, value to assign to the cookie.
        Returns:
        Cookie object containing the requested cookie.
